data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hemp, Claudia (2016): The Eastern Arc Mountains and coastal forests of East Africa—an archive to understand large-scale biogeographical patterns: Pseudotomias, a new genus of African Pseudophyllinae (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae). Zootaxa 4126 (4): 480-490, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4126.4.2
